name: Grand Canyon National Park
description: The Grand Canyon is one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World and the most visited national park in Arizona. Carved by the Colorado River, the canyon features stunning layers of colorful rock and dramatic vistas.

name: Yellowstone National Park
description: Yellowstone is the world's first national park and spans across three states. Known for its geothermal features, abundant wildlife, and pristine wilderness, Yellowstone offers unparalleled opportunities for adventure.

name: Yosemite National Park
description: Yosemite is famous for its giant sequoias, waterfalls, and massive granite cliffs. The park showcases some of the most beautiful and diverse landscapes in North America.

name: Zion National Park
description: Zion National Park features towering red cliffs, narrow canyons, and the Virgin River. The park's most famous hike, Angels Landing, offers spectacular views of the canyon.

name: Rocky Mountain National Park
description: Rocky Mountain National Park is a stunning showcase of alpine tundra and coniferous forests. The park offers over 300 miles of trails and incredible mountain scenery.

name: Glacier National Park
description: Glacier National Park is named for its hundreds of glaciers and pristine turquoise lakes. The park features dramatic mountain scenery and diverse wildlife.

name: Great Smoky Mountains National Park
description: Great Smoky Mountains is the most visited national park in the United States. Famous for its misty mountains, diverse wildlife, and vibrant fall colors.

name: Acadia National Park
description: Acadia National Park is home to Cadillac Mountain, the highest point on the Atlantic Coast. The park features rocky coastlines, forests, and mountain peaks.

name: Death Valley National Park
description: Death Valley is the hottest, driest, and lowest point in North America. Despite its harsh environment, the park offers otherworldly beauty and excellent stargazing.

name: Joshua Tree National Park
description: Joshua Tree showcases the unique Mojave Desert landscape with distinctive Joshua Trees. The park is a haven for rock climbers and stargazers.

name: Bryce Canyon National Park
description: Bryce Canyon features otherworldly red rock formations called hoodoos. Despite its name, it's actually a series of canyons rather than a single canyon.

name: Arches National Park
description: Arches National Park is famous for its over 2,000 natural stone arches, including the iconic Delicate Arch. The park showcases the unique geology of the Colorado Plateau.

name: Canyonlands National Park
description: Canyonlands features a vast labyrinth of canyons, mesas, and buttes carved by the Colorado and Green Rivers. The park offers incredible scenic vistas and outdoor adventures.

name: Grand Teton National Park
description: Grand Teton showcases some of the most dramatic mountain peaks in North America. The park features pristine lakes, abundant wildlife, and alpine landscapes.

name: Everglades National Park
description: The Everglades is a vast subtropical wilderness known for its unique ecosystem and abundant wildlife including alligators and manatees. The park protects millions of acres of pristine wetlands.
